Method.name: OnPageCSPROOT
Method.Implementation: Write ! s id=%request.Get("id") s obj=##class(Docs.Remont).%OpenId(id) d:$ISOBJECT(obj) . s mn(1)="января",mn(2)="февраля",mn(3)="марта",mn(4)="апреля",mn(5)="мая",mn(6)="июня",mn(7)="июля",mn(8)="августа",mn(9)="сентября",mn(10)="октября",mn(11)="ноября",mn(12)="декабря" . s numb=obj.Name . d:$ISOBJECT(obj.Kontr) . . s serv=obj.Kontr.Name . . s addr=obj.Kontr.City_" "_obj.Kontr.Address . . s email=obj.Kontr.EMail . . s tel=obj.Kontr.Phones . . s Agree=obj.Kontr.Agree . . s chief=obj.Kontr.chief . . s fax=obj.Kontr.fax . s day=$P($ZD(obj.Dat,4),"/",1) . s month=mn(+$P($ZD(obj.Dat,4),"/",2)) . s year=$P($ZD(obj.Dat,4),"/",3) Write ! Do ..OnPageHTML()

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<meta http-equiv=Content-Type content=""text/html; charset=windows-1251"">" Write !,"<meta name=ProgId content=Word.Document>" Write !,"<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname")))_"</title>",! Write "<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>",! Write " <o:DocumentProperties>",! Write " <o:Author>Slava</o:Author>",! Write " <o:LastAuthor>Полиграф</o:LastAuthor>",! Write " <o:Revision>2</o:Revision>",! Write " <o:TotalTime>2</o:TotalTime>",! Write " <o:LastPrinted>2006-01-30T08:44:00Z</o:LastPrinted>",! Write " <o:Created>2006-06-01T13:23:00Z</o:Created>",! Write " <o:LastSaved>2006-06-01T13:23:00Z</o:LastSaved>",! Write " <o:Pages>1</o:Pages>",! Write " <o:Words>109</o:Words>",! Write " <o:Characters>626</o:Characters>",! Write " <o:Company>AstConInvest</o:Company>",! Write " <o:Lines>5</o:Lines>",! Write " <o:Paragraphs>1</o:Paragraphs>",! Write " <o:CharactersWithSpaces>768</o:CharactersWithSpaces>",! Write " <o:Version>9.3821</o:Version>",! Write " </o:DocumentProperties>",! Write "</xml><![endif]-->" Write !,"<style>" Write !,"<!--",! Write " /* Font Definitions */",! Write "@font-face",! Write " {font-family:Tahoma;",! Write " panose-1:2 11 6 4 3 5 4 4 2 4;",! Write " mso-font-charset:204;",! Write " mso-generic-font-family:swiss;",! Write " mso-font-pitch:variable;",! Write " mso-font-signature:1627421319 -2147483648 8 0 66047 0;}",! Write "@font-face",! Write " {font-family:""Arial Unicode MS"";",! Write " mso-font-charset:128;",! Write " mso-generic-font-family:swiss;",! Write " mso-font-pitch:variable;",! Write " mso-font-signature:16792199 151977984 16 0 4129023 0;}",! Write "@font-face",! Write " {font-family:""\@Arial Unicode MS"";",! Write " mso-font-charset:128;",! Write " mso-generic-font-family:swiss;",! Write " mso-font-pitch:variable;",! Write " mso-font-signature:16792199 151977984 16 0 4129023 0;}",! Write " /* Style Definitions */",! Write "p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal",! Write " {mso-style-parent:"""";",! Write " margin:0cm;",! Write " margin-bottom:.0001pt;",! Write " mso-pagination:widow-orphan;",! Write " font-size:12.0pt;",! Write " font-family:""Times New Roman"";",! Write " mso-fareast-font-family:""Times New Roman"";}",! Write "h1",! Write " {mso-style-next:Обычный;",! Write " margin:0cm;",! Write " margin-bottom:.0001pt;",! Write " mso-pagination:widow-orphan;",! Write " page-break-after:avoid;",! Write " mso-outline-level:1;",! Write " font-size:14.0pt;",! Write " mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;",! Write " font-family:Arial;",! Write " mso-fareast-font-family:""Arial Unicode MS"";",! Write " mso-font-kerning:0pt;}",! Write "p.MsoDocumentMap, li.MsoDocumentMap, div.MsoDocumentMap",! Write " {margin:0cm;",! Write " margin-bottom:.0001pt;",! Write " mso-pagination:widow-orphan;",! Write " background:navy;",! Write " font-size:12.0pt;",! Write " font-family:Tahoma;",! Write " mso-fareast-font-family:""Times New Roman"";}",! Write "@page Section1",! Write " {size:841.9pt 595.3pt;",! Write " mso-page-orientation:landscape;",! Write " margin:3.0cm 2.0cm 42.55pt 2.0cm;",! Write " mso-header-margin:35.45pt;",! Write " mso-footer-margin:35.45pt;",! Write " mso-paper-source:0;}",! Write "div.Section1",! Write " {page:Section1;}",! Write ".tdclass{border:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt}",! Write "-->" Write !,"</style>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html xmlns:o=""urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office"" xmlns:w=""urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word"" xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40"">" Write !,! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write !,! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,!,"</html>"

Method.name: OnPreHTTP
Method.Implementation: if %request.Get("word")="on" { set %response.ContentType = "application/msword" do %response.SetHeader("Content-Disposition","attachment;word.doc") set %response.Expires = "Thu, 01 Apr 2003 00:00:00 GMT" } q 1
